thread.title: Victoria Walden Joins Hyundai's Communications Team as Social Media and Influencer Engagement Manager

author: cnbc.com
title: Victoria Walden Joins Hyundai's Communications Team as Social Media and Influencer Engagement Manager

organizations.name: hyundai's communications team as social media

text:
FOUNTAIN VALLEY, Calif., March 2, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- The communications team at Hyundai Motor America has added Victoria Walden as manager of Social Media and Influencer Engagement. Victoria is responsible for leading Hyundai Motor America's public relations efforts in influencer activations and social media, along with other traditional public relations activities for Hyundai products and company initiatives. Victoria reports to Michael Stewart, senior group manager of Corporate and Marketing Public Relations.
Victoria has more than 10 years of social media and public relations experience at agencies, corporations and at one point, her own consulting company. Most recently, Victoria was Head of Social Media at SnackNation where she developed a social strategy that resulted in more than 10 times the followers and engagements with key audience segments. She also successfully planned and managed influencer programs for e-commerce launches and managed all social channels including monitoring, publishing and content development. Victoria has a passion for cars and prior to her time at SnackNation, was the manager of Social Media for professional racing driver, Tanner Foust.
"With ever-changing consumer preferences and media habits, we understand social media is an important component of staying ahead of our competition," said Stewart. "We are making it a priority to expand our digital media activities and with Victoria's significant social media background, she is the perfect fit to lead this effort."
Victoria graduated from George Mason University's School of Management with a Bachelor's Degree in Marketing.
Hyundai Motor America
Hyundai Motor America is focused on delivering an outstanding customer experience grounded in design leadership, engineering excellence and exceptional value in every vehicle we sell. Hyundai's technology-rich product lineup of cars, SUVs and alternative-powered electric and fuel cell vehicles is backed by Hyundai Assuranceâ€”our promise to deliver peace of mind to our customers. Hyundai vehicles are sold and serviced through more than 830 dealerships nationwide and the majority sold in the U.S. are built at U.S. manufacturing facilities, including Hyundai Motor Manufacturing Alabama. Hyundai Motor America is headquartered in Fountain Valley, California, and is a subsidiary of Hyundai Motor Company of Korea.
